comment: Yeah! Both times I made sure to stay super hydrated before, during, and after. No exercise and just rest to be safe. Not sure how much of that helped, but it probably helped at least some.
amr:
# ::snt Yeah! Both times I made sure to stay super hydrated before, during, and after. No exercise and just rest to be safe. Not sure how much of that helped, but it probably helped at least some.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (y / yeah
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (e / ensure-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / stay-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG3 (h / hydrate-01
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :degree (s2 / super))
                  :time (a / and
                        :op1 (b / before)
                        :op2 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (a3 / after)
                              :op2 a3))))
      :time (t / time
            :mod (b2 / both))
      :snt3 (a4 / and
            :op1 (e2 / exercise-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii)
            :op2 (r / rest-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :mod (j / just)
                  :purpose (s3 / safe-01
                        :ARG1 ii)))
      :snt4 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s4 / sure-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :quant-of (h2 / help-01
                              :ARG0 (t3 / that))))
            :ARG2 (p / probable
                  :domain (h3 / help-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
                        :ARG1 (s5 / some
                              :quant (a5 / at-least))))))
